verses.firstHalf: He gives snow like wool
verses.secondHalf: and scatters the white frost like ashes.

verses.firstHalf: He casts forth his ice like crumbs;
verses.secondHalf: who is able to abide his frost?

verses.firstHalf: He sends out his word and melts them;
verses.secondHalf: he blows with his wind, and the waters flow.

verses.firstHalf: He declares his word unto Jacob,
verses.secondHalf: his statutes and ordinances unto Israel.

verses.firstHalf: He has not dealt so with other nations;
verses.secondHalf: neither have they knowledge of his laws. Praise the LORD.

verses.firstHalf: Praise the LORD. O praise the LORD of heaven;
verses.secondHalf: praise him in the heights.

verses.firstHalf: Praise him, all you angels of his;
verses.secondHalf: praise him, all his host.

verses.firstHalf: Praise him, sun and moon;
verses.secondHalf: praise him, all you stars of light.

verses.firstHalf: Praise him, all you highest heavens,
verses.secondHalf: and you waters that are above the heavens.

verses.firstHalf: Let them praise the Name of the LORD,
verses.secondHalf: for he spoke the word, and they were made; he commanded, and they were created.

verses.firstHalf: He has made them stand fast for ever and ever;
verses.secondHalf: he has given them a law which shall not be broken.

verses.firstHalf: Praise the LORD upon earth,
verses.secondHalf: you sea monsters and all deeps;

verses.firstHalf: Fire and hail, snow and fog,
verses.secondHalf: wind and storm, fulfilling his word;

verses.firstHalf: Mountains and all hills,
verses.secondHalf: fruitful trees and all cedars;

verses.firstHalf: Beasts and all cattle,
verses.secondHalf: creeping things and birds of the air;

verses.firstHalf: Kings of the earth and all peoples,
verses.secondHalf: princes and all rulers of the world;

verses.firstHalf: Young men and maidens,
verses.secondHalf: old men and children together.

verses.firstHalf: Let them praise the Name of the LORD,
verses.secondHalf: for his Name only is excellent, and his praise above heaven and earth.

verses.firstHalf: He shall exalt the horn of his people; all his faithful shall praise him,
verses.secondHalf: the children of Israel, the people who are near him. Praise the LORD.

verses.firstHalf: Praise the LORD. O sing unto the LORD a new song;
verses.secondHalf: let the congregation of the faithful praise him.

verses.firstHalf: Let Israel rejoice in the one who made him,
verses.secondHalf: and let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.

verses.firstHalf: Let them praise his Name in the dance;
verses.secondHalf: let them sing praises unto him with timbrel and harp.

verses.firstHalf: For the LORD has pleasure in his people
verses.secondHalf: and gives victory to those who are oppressed.

verses.firstHalf: Let the faithful be joyful with glory;
verses.secondHalf: let them rejoice upon their beds.

verses.firstHalf: Let the praises of God be in their mouth
verses.secondHalf: and a two-edged sword in their hands,

verses.firstHalf: To inflict vengeance on the nations,
verses.secondHalf: and to rebuke the peoples,

verses.firstHalf: To bind their kings in chains,
verses.secondHalf: and their nobles with links of iron,

verses.firstHalf: That they may execute judgment upon them, as it is written;
verses.secondHalf: this is the honor of all his servants. Praise the LORD.

verses.firstHalf: Praise the LORD. Praise God in his holiness;
verses.secondHalf: praise him in the firmament of his power.

verses.firstHalf: Praise him for his mighty acts;
verses.secondHalf: praise him for his excellent greatness.

verses.firstHalf: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet;
verses.secondHalf: praise him upon the lute and harp.

verses.firstHalf: Praise him with the timbrels and dances;
verses.secondHalf: praise him upon the strings and pipe.

verses.firstHalf: Praise him with the resounding cymbals;
verses.secondHalf: praise him with the loud cymbals.

verses.firstHalf: Let everything that has breath praise the LORD.
verses.secondHalf: O praise the LORD.
